UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Peptide fragments of a beta-defensin derivative with potent bactericidal activity.
Literature.Author: Reynolds NL, De Cecco M, Taylor K, Stanton C, Kilanowski F, Kalapothakis J, Seo E, Uhrin D, Campopiano D, Govan J, Macmillan D, Barran P, Dorin JR

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MBC=>22µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MBC=>22µM),Burkholderia cenocepacia J2315(MBC=>22µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=>22µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 700802(MBC=>22µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MBC=>22µM),Staphylococcus aureus J2918(MBC=>22µM)
